title: (x) Sans Extended Light DTC (?)
content:
Anyone know what foundry makes Sans Extended Light DTC, and where I can purchase it?   
   
Thanks for the help -- i appreciate it.
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Are you sure you're not missing part of that font name?   
   
 [Nimbus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043405/http:/www.precisiontype.com/fontsdetails.asp?fn=URW-015896&results=25&back=list&n=0&tf=0&s=1&f=&st=&st2=&st3=&lf=&b=1&alpha=&stype=&query=Sans%25Extended) perhaps?

Stephen,   
   
I dunno. That's the file name I have here at the office. I'm trying to find it for the PC for a client.   
   
It's used on their website (in the navigation): [http://www.iss-solutions.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043405/http:/www.iss-solutions.com/)   
   
It looks very close. Can you please confirm?   
   
You're the best.

I think you're looking for [Helvetica Light Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043405/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica/helvetica-43-light-extended/testdrive.html?s=we%2Bsolve%2Bproblems&p=16).
You the man. Thanks for the help, as always.
